dt: {bc}the first sign of the zodiac in astrology {dx}see {dxt|Signs of the Zodiac Table|zodiac|table}{/dx}
{bc}one born under the sign of Aries
{bc}a constellation between Pisces and Taurus pictured as a ram

et: Latin (genitive {it}Arietis{/it}), literally, ram; perhaps akin to Greek {it}eriphos{/it} kid, Old Irish {it}heirp{/it} she-goat
shortdef: the first sign of the zodiac in astrology
one born under the sign of Aries
a constellation between Pisces and Taurus pictured as a ram

dt: {bc}person belonging to, connected with, or engaged in

et: Middle English {it}-arie{/it}, from Anglo-French & Latin; Anglo-French {it}-aire, -arie{/it}, from Latin {it}-arius, -aria, -arium{/it}, from {it}-arius{/it}, adjective suffix
shortdef: thing belonging to or connected with; especially : place of
person belonging to, connected with, or engaged in
